summary: The diff implements the overall single-page Valentine flow (Opening ‚Üí fade-to-black + pink fireworks ‚Üí Final screen), including responsive layout, pink theme, evasive ‚ÄúNo‚Äù button, floating hearts, GIF, and optional music control. However, a couple of spec text/title details appear missing or mismatched, and several unrequested/non-goal features were added (Internet Identity/auth scaffolding and a backend canister stub).

missing_requirements.requirement: The experience is titled ‚ÄúOpen At Your Own Risk üíå‚Äù (as part of the app experience, not just the HTML document title).
missing_requirements.reason: The browser document title is set, but no UI element in the shown components renders the title text ‚ÄúOpen At Your Own Risk üíå‚Äù.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the italic quote exactly as written: ‚ÄúEvery moment with you feels like a dream come true‚Ä¶‚Äù
missing_requirements.reason: OpeningScreen wraps the quote value in additional double-quote characters, so the user-visible text would not match the exact specified string.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication scaffolding/provider and actor hooks included (non-goal).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists ‚ÄúInternet Identity authentication‚Äù as a non-goal, but the diff adds and wires up InternetIdentityProvider/useInternetIdentity and an authenticated/anonymous actor hook.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister stub added despite frontend-only requirement/non-goal of backend APIs.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest says the experience should work as a standalone frontend and lists backend APIs as a non-goal, but an empty backend actor file was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link added on the Final Celebration Screen.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any requirement; adds extra user-facing content beyond the specified strings.
